resume_text:
NAME: David Garcia
EMAIL: david.garcia@example.com
PHONE: (555) 321-6547

SUMMARY:
Experienced DevOps Engineer with 8 years of experience automating and streamlining software development pipelines. Adept at using cloud technologies and infrastructure-as-code tools.

SKILLS:
AWS, Azure, GCP, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Ansible, Jenkins, Git, Python

EXPERIENCE:
Cloud Solutions Corp - Senior DevOps Engineer (2018 - Present)
- Designed and implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Docker.
- Automated infrastructure provisioning using Terraform and Ansible.

DevOps Inc - DevOps Engineer (2016 - 2018)
- Managed and maintained cloud infrastructure on AWS and Azure.
- Implemented monitoring and alerting solutions using Prometheus and Grafana.

EDUCATION:
Massachusetts Institute of Technology - Master's in Computer Engineering (2016)

CERTIFICATIONS:
AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Certified Kubernetes Administrator
